SEARCH
Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

Class ScoresScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.ScoresScene
public class ScoresScene extends BaseScene
ScoreScene class extends the BaseScene to create a scene to show the local scores and the online scores after the game is over.
Author:
Jesse Hardy
